description: Adversaries may use a non-application layer protocol for communication between host and C2 server or among infected hosts within a network Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Ncat Execution
query: (process.executable:*\\ncat.exe OR process.command_line:(*\ \-lvp\ * OR *\ \-l\ \-\-proxy\-type\ http\ * OR *\ \-\-exec\ cmd.exe\ * OR *\ \-vnl\ \-\-exec\ *))
